messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] social vandalism
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/9/03 12:59:05 PM, peggy@linmax.sao.arizona.edu writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/9/03 12:59:05 PM, peggy@... writes:

<< Insulting the volunteers and
> intimidating the newer members
> by saying "This is dumb, this isn't wrong, don't listen to it, you don't
> need it."
>
> Undermining the efforts of those who are willing to help people see the
full
> wonders of unschooling is social vandalism.

<<Great post. Wonderful choice of words. Exactly! >>

Except for me writing "this isn't wrong" instead of either "this is wrong" or
"this isn't right." <g>

Thanks.

messages.subject: social vandalism
messages.msgSnippet: ... Great post. Wonderful choice of words. Exactly! Peggy The ring always believes that the finger lives for it. --Chazal
messages.messageBody:
Sandra wrote:

> But maybe because this list comes into people's own homes, some people think
> nothing of doing the equivalent of the above. Insulting the volunteers and
> intimidating the newer members
> by saying "This is dumb, this isn't wrong, don't listen to it, you don't
> need it."
>
> Undermining the efforts of those who are willing to help people see the full
> wonders of unschooling is social vandalism.

Great post. Wonderful choice of words. Exactly!

Peggy

The ring always believes that the finger lives for it.
--Chazal
